offers.subTitle: Innovative Solar Solutions
offers.title: OUR OFFERS
offers.desc: We offer high-quality products and services, and a 25-year warranty for solar systems.

left.title: For business
left.desc: Complex solutions in the solar energy sphere for businesses are a great way to save money on electric energy.

right.title: For individuals
right.desc: Switching to an alternative energy source ensures a stable power supply for your home and lowers your electricity costs.

page_1.title: Take a step towards the sun

warranty.subtitle: Our Advantage
warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.desc: The solar solutions offered by SOLARA guarantee long-lasting quality and effectiveness. We provide a 25-year warranty for solar panels, 10 years for solar invertors, 10 years for battery systems, and 5 years for solar water heaters.

section.title: THE FUTURE IS NOW!
section.text_1: Solara was founded in 2019 and is the official distributor of solar panels from La Solar Group. Solara provides all types of services for the design, installation and maintenance of solar power plants of all kinds.
section.text_st: We also handle the selection and supply of various types of solar power plant equipment.
section.text_2: We offer an individual approach to each client, high-quality service, financial support, stability, and service guarantee.
section.text_st_2: We chose La Solar Group as our supplier for the following reasons:

ul.li_1: It is one of the largest American solar panel manufacturers in Armenia.
ul.li_2: The quality and power of the produced photovoltaic modules are confirmed by international certificates.
ul.li_3: The activities of the scientific and technical center, which is aimed at the development and implementation of high-tech products.
ul.li_4: Quality guarantee - for 10 years the solar battery power will not be less than 90% of the nominal, and within 25 years it will not be less than 80% of the nominal power.

section.text_3: Together with La Solar Group, we are focused on developing the latest technology to achieve the highest quality of our products.
section.text_4: La Solar Group is licensed for construction and design

Area.title_span: Solar System Installation Company: Vision and Mission
Area.title: Vision and Mission
Area.text: By providing the finest and most innovative solutions for solar energy, we aim to contribute, promote and grow in the global renewable energy sector.

Area_video.title: Video
Area_video.text: SOLARA offers a wide range of services - from design to installation and operation of solar stations. The company also provides a huge selection of additional equipment related to premium solar panels.

hero.title: Reliable source of energy for your home
hero.desc: Solar energy is an alternative source of energy supply guaranteeing a stable power supply to your home and a significant reduction in energy costs.

reasons.subTitle: For individuals
reasons.title: Reasons to Use a Solar Power Station

info.one: The solar station is an environmentally friendly, economical, and reliable source of electricity for your home. The MYSUN company offers ready-made products for the private home, which allows you to significantly reduce the time to choose equipment.
info.two: In the line of ready-made solutions from MYSUN, various variants of autonomous, autonomous hybrid, and network electrical equipment are presented. Trust the highly qualified MYSUN engineers to select the best kit for you.

features.three: Eliminate interruptions or accidents on power lines

income.title: MYSUN INCOME METHODS
income.desc: Usually, the energy that a solar station generates during the day is intended for the home's own consumption as a priority. In the event of no home consumption or excess power consumption, all unused solar electricity can be returned to the grid at the same tariff cost at which you buy solar energy from a utility company. If this volume exceeds this volume, the sale of electricity will be carried out at wholesale rates.

info.one: All this will allow the owner to reduce the cost of electricity consumed from the network, not only by using solar energy in the daytime but also by giving the excess electricity back to the network on favorable terms for him and even by earning some money.
info.two: During the day, consumption is minimal, and the solar station operates at maximum capacity; you provide electricity to the network, and in the evening, you return the energy you received earlier.

one.title: On the roof
one.desc: The cost of electricity is constantly increasing. In conditions of rather fierce competition, in order to maintain business profits, enterprises must develop measures to reduce costs. Often, the load schedule for energy carriers at enterprises is uneven, the load peak is during the day, which allows solar power plants to be the most effective solution for most commercial activities. In addition, the use of solar power plants allows you to quickly and easily increase the input power of the facility or create a reliable reservation of the most important nodes that are unacceptable in operation. If the object is largely dependent on the central network, you can use an autonomous solar power plant on its own, as well as in combination with an alternative energy source.

two.title: On the ground
two.desc: The cost of electricity is constantly increasing. In conditions of rather fierce competition, in order to maintain business profits, enterprises must develop measures to reduce costs. Often, the load schedule for energy carriers at enterprises is uneven, the load peak is during the day, which allows solar power plants to be the most effective solution for most commercial activities. In addition, the use of solar power plants allows you to quickly and easily increase the input power of the facility or create a reliable reservation of the most important nodes that are unacceptable in operation. If the object is largely dependent on the central network, you can use an autonomous solar power plant on its own, as well as in combination with an alternative energy source.
